svante august arrhenius.gloss: Swedish chemist and physicist noted for his theory of chemical dissociation (1859-1927)

sverdrup.gloss: Norwegian explorer who led expeditions into the Arctic (1855-1930)

sverige.gloss: a Scandinavian kingdom in the eastern part of the Scandinavian Peninsula

svizzera.gloss: a landlocked federal republic in central Europe

svr.gloss: Russia's intelligence service responsible for foreign operations, intelligence-gathering and analysis, and the exchange of intelligence information

svelte.gloss: being of delicate or slender build
